Maxwell stands alone
 Painting testimonial pictures

He is by himself in court. He is facing the judge alone. The prosecutor is using witnesses to prove that Maxwell killed those people. “Painting a picture” is a metaphor for showing what happened, usually with a lot of Adjectives.

She tells Max to stay when the class has gone away
 So he waits behind
 Writing fifty times “I must not be so, o, o, o”

A common punishment in school is to write something over and over. Presumably “I must not be so foolish.” or something along those lines.



When Paul was singing the “Writing 50 times” line, it is rumored that John was making funny faces at Paul which caused him to laugh.
P. C. 31 said, “We caught a dirty one”
P.C. is “Police Constable”.  Maxwell has been arrested and brought into custody.

Joan was quizzical, studied pataphysical
 Science in the home

Pataphysics is a surrealist concept invented by playwright Alfred Jarry popularized by his play Ubu Roi. It is described as “the science of imaginary solutions”.

Pataphysics is not a science, and doesn’t lend itself to serious study with test tubes. It’s practitioners are proudly frivolous, being to science what pastafarians are to religion. This sort of nonsense delighted the Beatles, so the reference is perfectly in keeping with their tastes.
